Title: Khaleja
Writer: Vedula Ravi Kiran (script coordinator), Saigopal (script coordinator), Trivikram Srinivas (story,  screenplay,  dialogue)
Actors: Mahesh Babu, Anushka Shetty, Prakash Raj, Brahmanandam
Plot: When a mysterious illness ravages a remote village, the villagers embrace a reluctant taxi driver as their savior.
